tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE LivestockInspectionReports (
  report_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  inspection_date DATE NOT NULL,
  inspector_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  livestock_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  health_assessment TEXT,
  condition_evaluation TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Livestock_Inspection_Reports (
  report_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  inspection_date DATE,
  inspector_name TEXT,
  livestock_id UUID,
  health_assessment TEXT,
  condition_evaluation TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Livestock (
  livestock_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  livestock_name TEXT,
  owner_name TEXT,
  species TEXT,
  birth_date DATE,
  weight DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE livestock_inspection_reports (
  report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  animal_id INT,
  inspector_id INT,
  inspection_date DATE,
  health_assessment TEXT,
  condition_evaluation TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE animals (
  animal_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  species VARCHAR(50),
  age INT,
  sex VARCHAR(10),
  weight DECIMAL(5,2)
);

CREATE TABLE LivestockInspectionReports (
  report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  inspector_name VARCHAR(50),
  inspection_date DATE,
  health_assessment TEXT,
  condition_evaluation TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Livestock (
  livestock_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  species VARCHAR(50),
  breed VARCHAR(50),
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10)
);

CREATE TABLE ComplianceRecords (
  record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  report_id INT,
  compliance_status VARCHAR(20),
  compliance_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (report_id) REFERENCES LivestockInspectionReports(report_id)
);

CREATE TABLE inspection_reports (
  report_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  animal_id INT,
  inspector_name VARCHAR(50),
  inspection_date DATE,
  health_assessment VARCHAR(500),
  condition_evaluation VARCHAR(500)
);

CREATE TABLE animals (
  animal_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  animal_name VARCHAR(50),
  species VARCHAR(50),
  birth_date DATE,
  sex CHAR(1),
  breed VARCHAR(50)
);
